tagline: Motor Intelligence Infrastructure for Physical AI

hero.headline: Motor Intelligence Infrastructure for Physical AI
hero.body:
We build the execution layer that makes physical AI systems actually work,
across changing environments, with safety guarantees, personalized to each
user.

problem.headline: Physical AI has a transfer problem
body: Physical AI has a transfer problem.
AI models can learn to control robots in simulation. But when the physics change - different gravity, different bodies, different environments - policies trained in one context fail in another.
The gap between AI intent and physical execution is where most systems break.

product.headline: What you integrate
product.intro: RAST is a software stack you integrate into a physical system. It turns expert demonstrations into a deployable intent package, executes locally under current physics, and enforces deterministic safety constraints at runtime.

cards.title: Intent Studio
cards.body: Offline/cloud tooling that extracts the cost function / motor signature (IOC) from demonstrations and exports a deployable intent package.

cards.title: RAST Runtime
cards.body: On-device software integrated alongside the existing control stack. Uses the intent package + live state to compute local execution (OFC/MPC-style).

cards.title: Safety Guardian
cards.body: Deterministic constraint enforcement and monitoring. Clamps unsafe actions and produces audit logs for safety-critical use.

items.title: Space Robotics
items.body: Teleoperation with long delays requires a different paradigm. RAST enables intent transfer: send objectives, let the robot optimize locally.

items.title: Clinical Rehabilitation
items.body: Precision motor guidance: instead of generic protocols, capture each person’s motor signature and guide change within their own optimization preferences.

items.title: Autonomous Systems
items.body: Physical AI that must generalize across environments, users, or operating conditions benefits from an execution layer that adapts under constraints.

technology.headline: Built on established science, applied in new ways.
bullets: Optimal Motor Control: The physics of how skilled movement emerges from real-time optimization
Inverse Optimal Control: Extracting the hidden cost function from observed behavior
Minimal Intervention Principle: Correct only what matters to the task
Deterministic Safety Architecture: 1kHz control loops with hard guarantees
technology.closing: We don't invent new physics. We build the engineering bridge from theory to deployment.

team.headline: Team

founder.name: Nitsan Sharon
founder.bio: I have spent decades building high-reliability systems where correctness and operational reality matter. Today I apply that mindset to Physical AI, turning rigorous movement science into software that can run in the loop, safely and measurably, in the real world.

chiefScientist.name: Tomer Sela
chiefScientist.bio: I am an MSc in Mechanical Engineering from the Technion BCI Lab, focused on motor control. I bridge scientific rigor with practical implementation, drawing on R&D experience at Rafael on mission-critical autonomous systems.
